style.name: id - File - Identification
style.description: File identification information (BOOKID, FILENAME, EDITOR, MODIFICATION DATE)

style.name: usfm - File - USFM Version ID
style.description: File markup version information

style.name: ide - File - Encoding
style.description: File encoding information

style.name: h - File - Header
style.description: Running header text for a book (basic)

style.name: DEPRECATED h1 - File - Header
style.description: Running header text

style.name: DEPRECATED h2 - File - Left Header
style.description: Running header text, left side of page

style.name: DEPRECATED h3 - File - Right Header
style.description: Running header text, right side of page

style.name: toc1 - File - Long Table of Contents Text
style.description: Long table of contents text

style.name: toc2 - File - Short Table of Contents Text
style.description: Short table of contents text

style.name: toc3 - File - Book Abbreviation
style.description: Book Abbreviation

style.name: toca1 - File - Alternative Language Long Table of Contents Text
style.description: Alternative language long table of contents text

style.name: toca2 - File - Alternative Language Short Table of Contents Text
style.description: Alternative language short table of contents text

style.name: toca3 - File - Alternative Language Book Abbreviation
style.description: Alternative language book Abbreviation

style.name: rem - File - Remark
style.description: Comments and remarks

style.name: sts - File - Status
style.description: Status of this file

style.name: restore - File - Restore Information
style.description: Project restore information

style.name: imt - Introduction - Major Title Level 1
style.description: Introduction application menu title (not Printed)

style.name: imt1 - Introduction - Major Title Level 1
style.description: Introduction major title, level 1 (Printed)

style.name: imt2 - Introduction - Major Title Level 2
style.description: Introduction major title, level 2

style.name: imt3 - Introduction - Major Title Level 3
style.description: Introduction major title, level 3

style.name: imt4 - Introduction - Major Title Level 4
style.description: Introduction major title, level 4 (usually within parenthesis)

style.name: imte - Introduction - [Uncommon] Major Title at Introduction End Level 1
style.description: Introduction major title at introduction end, level 1 (if single level)

style.name: imte1 - Introduction - [Uncommon] Major Title at Introduction End Level 1
style.description: Text included in toc2. Numbers may be written out

style.name: imte2 - Introduction - [Uncommon] Major Title at Introduction End Level 2
style.description: Included in toc1 but not in toc2.

style.name: is1 - Introduction - Section Heading Level 1
style.description: Introduction section heading, level 1 (if multiple levels)

style.name: is2 - Introduction - Section Heading Level 2
style.description: Introduction minor section heading, level 2

style.name: iot - Introduction - Outline Title
style.description: Introduction outline title (basic)

style.name: io1 - Introduction - Outline Level 1
style.description: Introduction outline text, level 1 (basic)

style.name: io2 - Introduction - Outline Level 2
style.description: Introduction outline text, level 2 (basic)

style.name: io3 - Introduction - Outline Level 3
style.description: Introduction outline text, level 3

style.name: io4 - Introduction - Outline Level 4
style.description: Introduction outline text, level 4

style.name: ior...ior* - Introduction - Outline References Range
style.description: Introduction references range for outline entry; for marking references separately

style.name: ip - Introduction - Paragraph
style.description: Regular paragraph in Introduction (basic)

style.name: im - Introduction - Paragraph - no first line indent
style.description: Introduction prose paragraph, with no first line indent (may occur after poetry)

style.name: ipi - Introduction - Indented Para - first line indent
style.description: Introduction prose paragraph, indented, with first line indent

style.name: imi - Introduction - Indented Para - no first line indent
style.description: Introduction prose paragraph text, indented, with no first line indent

style.name: ili1 - Introduction - List Entry - Level 1
style.description: A list entry, level 1 (if multiple levels)

style.name: ili2 - Introduction - List Entry - Level 2
style.description: A list entry, level 2

style.name: ipq - Introduction - Paragraph - quote from text
style.description: Introduction prose paragraph, quote from the body text

style.name: imq - Introduction - Paragraph - quote from text - no first line indent
style.description: Introduction prose paragraph, quote from the body text, with no first line indent

style.name: ipr - Introduction - Paragraph - right aligned
style.description: Introduction prose paragraph, right aligned

style.name: ib - Introduction - Blank Line
style.description: Introduction blank line

style.name: iq1 - Introduction - Poetry Level 1
style.description: Introduction poetry text, level 1 (if multiple levels)

style.name: iq2 - Introduction - Poetry Level 2
style.description: Introduction poetry text, level 2

style.name: iq3 - Introduction - Poetry Level 3
style.description: Introduction poetry text, level 3

style.name: iex - Introduction - Explanatory or Bridge Text
style.description: Explanation paragraph doubtful reading (MRK 16:9 JHN 7:52)

style.name: iqt...iqt* - Special Text - Quoted Scripture Text in Introduction
style.description: For quoted scripture text appearing in the introduction

style.name: ie - Introduction - End Marker
style.description: Introduction ending marker (optional)

style.name: c - Chapter Number
style.description: Chapter number

style.name: ca...ca* - Chapter Number - Alternate
style.description: Second (alternate) chapter number (for coding dual versification; useful for places where different traditions of chapter breaks need to be supported in the same translation)

style.name: cp - Chapter Number - Publishing Alternate
style.description: Published chapter number (chapter string that should appear in the published text)

style.name: cl - Chapter - Publishing Label
style.description: Chapter Title Used for Psalms. Replaces chapter number

style.name: cd - Chapter - Description
style.description: Chapter Description (Publishing option D, e.g. in Russian Bibles)

style.name: v - Verse Number
style.description: Verse number

style.name: va...va* - Verse Number - Alternate
style.description: Second (alternate) verse number (for coding dual numeration in Psalms; see also NRSV Exo 22.1-4)

style.name: vp...vp* - Verse Number - Publishing Alternate
style.description: Published verse marker - NIV11 doubtful verses in [ ]

style.name: p - Paragraph - Normal - First Line Indent
style.description: Paragraph text, with first line indent (basic)

style.name: m - Paragraph - Margin - No First Line Indent
style.description: Paragraph text, with no first line indent (often occurs after poetry) (basic)

style.name: po - Paragraph - Letter Opening
style.description: Letter opening

style.name: Refrain paragraph
style.description: Paragraph text, right aligned (DEU 27:15-26)

style.name: cls - Paragraph - Letter Closing
style.description: Letter Closing

style.name: pmo - Embedded text opening paragraph (basic)
style.description: Embedded text opening

style.name: pm - Paragraph - Embedded Text
style.description: Embedded text paragraph (basic)

style.name: pmc - Paragraph - Embedded Text Closing
style.description: Embedded text closing paragraph

style.name: pmr - Paragraph - Embedded Text Refrain
style.description: Embedded Refrain. (Poetry text, Right Aligned.)

style.name: pi1 - Paragraph - Indented - Level 1 - First Line Indent
style.description: Indented paragraph (GEN 36, NUM 2,33)

style.name: pc - Paragraph - Centered (for Inscription)
style.description: Inscription paragraph(centered, small caps)

style.name: mi - Paragraph - Indented - No First Line Indent
style.description: Embedded continuation paragraph (REV 16:15, continuation after embedded poetry)

style.name: nb - Paragraph - No Break with Previous Paragraph
style.description: Paragraph text, with no break from previous paragraph text (at chapter boundary) (basic)

style.name: q - Poetry - Indent Level 1 - Single Level Only
style.description: Poetry text, level 1 indent (if single level)

style.name: q1 - Poetry - Indent Level 1
style.description: Poetry Line A (basic)

style.name: q2 - Poetry - Indent Level 2
style.description: Poetry Line B (basic)

style.name: q3 - Poetry - Indent Level 3
style.description: Poetry Line C (1CH 12:18 PRO 6:16-19 Zep 1:5 LUK 6:7 PHP 2:8)

style.name: q4 - Poetry - Indent Level 4
style.description: Poetry Coda (e.g., "declares the Lord")

style.name: qc - Poetry - Centered
style.description: Doxology. (Poetry text, centered.)

style.name: qr - Poetry - Right Aligned
style.description: Refrain. (Poetry: Line B, Italic) (PSA 136)

style.name: qs...qs* - Poetry Text - Selah
style.description: Poetry text, Selah

style.name: qa - Poetry - Acrostic Heading/Marker
style.description: Acrostic. (Poetry text, marker/heading.)

style.name: qac...qac* - Poetry Text - Acrostic Letter
style.description: Poetry text, Acrostic markup of the first character of a line of acrostic poetry

style.name: qm - Poetry - Embedded Text - Indent Level 1 - Single Level Only
style.description: Poetry explanatory text (left margin.)

style.name: qm1 - Poetry - Embedded Text - Indent Level 1
style.description: Embedded Line A. (Poetry text, embedded, level 1 indent (if multiple levels).)

style.name: qm2 - Poetry - Embedded Text - Indent Level 2
style.description: Poetry text, embedded, level 2 indent

style.name: qm3 - Poetry - Embedded Text - Indent Level 3
style.description: Poetry text, embedded, level 3 indent

style.name: qd - Poetry - Hebrew Note
style.description: A Hebrew musical performance annotation, similar in content to Hebrew descriptive title.

style.name: b - Poetry - Stanza Break (Blank Line)
style.description: Break between Stanzas Lists (Outline or Series).(basic)

style.name: mt - Title - Major Title Level 1
style.description: The main title of the book (if single level)

style.name: mt1 - Title - Major Title Level 1
style.description: Text included in toc2. Numbers may be written out (basic)

style.name: mt2 - Title - Major Title Level 2
style.description: Included in toc1 but not in toc2. Occurs before and\or after mt1.

style.name: mt3 - Title - Major Title Level 3
style.description: Usually after mt1 and 2. Not included in toc1 e.g. Alternate title

style.name: mt4 - Title - Major Title level 4
style.description: Additional book title text. Often in parentheses e.g. book dates

style.name: mte - Title - [Uncommon] Major Title Ending Level 1
style.description: The main title of the book repeated at the end of the book, level 1 (if single level)

style.name: mte1 - Title - [Uncommon] Major Title Ending Level 1
style.description: The main title of the book repeated at the end of the book, level 1 (if multiple levels)

style.name: mte2 - Title - [Uncommon] Major Title Ending Level 2
style.description: A secondary title occurring before or after the 'ending' main title

style.name: ms - Heading - Major Section Level 1
style.description: Psalm Book section headings. Text should be All Caps

style.name: ms1 - Heading - Major Section Level 1
style.description: Level 1 Major section heading (PRO 1,10,22,24,25,30,31)

style.name: ms2 - Heading - Major Section Level 2
style.description: Level 2 discourse section marker. Not printed. Controls formatting of vertical spacing and following Para.

style.name: ms3 - Heading - Major Section Level 3
style.description: Level 3 discourse section marker. Not printed. Controls formatting of vertical spacing and following Para.

style.name: mr - Heading - Major Section Range References
style.description: Major section division references/range. Psalm 1,42,73,90,107

style.name: s - Heading - Section Level 1
style.description: Section division marker. Title is not printed

style.name: s1 - Heading - Section Level 1
style.description: Section heading printed (basic)

style.name: s2 - Heading - Section Level 2
style.description: Subsection heading

style.name: s3 - Heading - Section Level 3
style.description: Heading in embedded text (DAN 4:18)

style.name: s4 - Heading - Section Level 4
style.description: Heading level 4 - Deprecated for Doubtful reading, use iex (MRK 16:9 JHN 7:52)

style.name: sr - Heading - Section Range References
style.description: Section division references/range.

style.name: r - Heading - Parallel References
style.description: Parallel reference(s)

style.name: sp - Label - Speaker
style.description: A heading, to identify the speaker (e.g. Job)

style.name: d - Label - Descriptive Title - Hebrew Subtitle
style.description: Hebrew text heading, a.k.a. subtitle, to provide description (e.g. Psalms)

style.name: sd - Label - Semantic Division Location - Level 1
style.description: Vertical space used to divide the text into sections, level 1 (if single level)

style.name: sd1 - Label - Semantic Division Location - Level 1
style.description: Vertical space used to divide the text into sections, level 1 (if multiple levels)

style.name: sd2 - Label - Semantic Division Location - Level 2
style.description: Vertical space used to divide the text into sections, level 2

style.name: sd3 - Label - Semantic Division Location - Level 3
style.description: Vertical space used to divide the text into sections, level 3

style.name: sd4 - Label - Semantic Division Location - Level 4
style.description: Vertical space used to divide the text into sections, level 4

style.name: tr - Table - Row
style.description: Table row beginning (basic)

style.name: th1 - Table - Column 1 Heading
style.description: Table column 1 heading or footer. Ezra 2:58, Neh. 7:60

style.name: th2 - Table - Column 2 Heading
style.description: A table heading, column 2

style.name: th3 - Table - Column 3 Heading
style.description: A table heading, column 3

style.description: A table heading, column 4

style.description: A table heading, column 5

style.description: A table heading, column 6

style.description: A table heading, column 7

style.description: A table heading, column 8

style.description: A table heading, column 9

style.name: th10 - Table - Column 10 Heading
style.description: A table heading, column 10

style.name: th11 - Table - Column 11 Heading
style.description: A table heading, column 11

style.name: th12 - Table - Column 12 Heading
style.description: A table heading, column 12

style.description: Table cell, Col 1 (basic)

style.name: tc2 - Table - Column 2 Cell
style.description: Table cell, Col 2 (basic)

style.description: Table cell item in column 3

style.description: Table cell item in column 5

style.description: A table cell item, column 1, right aligned

style.name: lh - List Header
style.description: List header (introductory remark)

style.name: li1 - List Entry - Level 1
style.description: List item, level 1 (basic)

style.name: li2 - List Entry - Level 2
style.description: List item, level 2 (basic)

style.name: li3 - List Entry - Level 3
style.description: item 3 Gen 46:12,17

style.name: li4 - List Entry - Level 4
style.description: List introduction, conclusion, elaboration (basic)

style.name: lf - List Footer
style.description: List footer (concluding remark)

style.name: lim - Embedded List Entry - Level 1
style.description: An embedded list entry, level 1 (if single level)

style.name: lim1 - Embedded List Entry - Level 1
style.description: An embedded list entry, level 1 (if multiple levels)

style.name: lim2 - Embedded List Entry - Level 2
style.description: An embedded list entry, level 2

style.name: lim3 - Embedded List Item - Level 3
style.description: An embedded list item, level 3

style.name: lim4 - Embedded List Entry - Level 4
style.description: An embedded list entry, level 4

style.name: litl...litl* - List Item Total
style.description: List entry total, use in “accounting” lists for denoting the total component of the text within a list item

style.name: lik...lik* - Structured List Entry - Key
style.description: Structured list entry key text

style.name: liv...liv* - Structured List Entry - Value
style.description: Structured list entry value content (if single value)

style.name: liv1...liv1* - Structured List Entry - Value 1
style.description: Structured list entry value 1 content (if multiple values)

style.name: liv2...liv2* - Structured List Entry - Value 2
style.description: Structured list entry value 2 content

style.name: liv3...liv3* - Structured List Entry - Value 3
style.description: Structured list entry value 3 content

style.name: liv4...liv4* - Structured List Entry - Value 4
style.description: Structured list entry value 4 content

style.name: liv5...liv5* - Structured List Entry - Value 5
style.description: Structured list entry value 5 content

style.name: f...f* - Footnote
style.description: A Footnote

style.name: fe...fe* - Endnote
style.description: An Endnote text item

style.name: fr - Footnote - Reference
style.description: The origin reference for the footnote (basic)

style.name: ft - Footnote - Text
style.description: Footnote text, Protocanon (basic)

style.name: fk - Footnote - Keyword
style.description: The specific keyword/term from the text for which the footnote is being provided (basic)

style.name: fq - Footnote - Quotation or Alternate Rendering
style.description: An alternative rendering (basic)

style.name: fqa - Footnote - Alternate Translation Rendering
style.description: A footnote alternate rendering for a portion of scripture text(basic)

style.name: fl - Footnote - Label Text
style.description: Footnote - Publishing Alternate reference (corresponds to to vp)

style.name: fw - Footnote - Witness List
style.description: A footnote witness list, for distinguishing a list of sigla representing witnesses in critical editions.

style.name: fp - Footnote Paragraph Mark
style.description: A Footnote additional paragraph marker

style.name: fv...fv* - Footnote - Embedded Verse Number
style.description: A verse number within the footnote text

style.name: DEPRECATED fdc...fdc* - Footnote - DC text
style.description: Footnote text, applies to Deuterocanon only

style.name: fm - Footnote - Additional Caller to Previous Note
style.description: An additional footnote marker location for a previous footnote

style.name: x...x* - Cross Reference
style.description: A list of cross references

style.name: xo - Cross Reference - Origin Reference
style.description: Cross reference origin reference

style.name: xop - Cross Reference - Origin Reference Publishing Alternate
style.description: Published cross reference origin reference (origin reference that should appear in the published text)

style.name: xt - Cross Reference - Target References
style.description: Cross reference target reference(s)

style.name: xta - Cross Reference - Target References Added Text
style.description: Cross reference target references added text

style.name: xk - Cross Reference - Keyword
style.description: A cross reference keyword

style.name: xq - Cross Reference - Quotation
style.description: A cross-reference quotation from the scripture text

style.name: xot...xot* - Cross Reference - OT Target Refs (optional)
style.description: Cross-reference target reference(s), Old Testament only

style.name: xnt...xnt* - Cross Reference - NT Target Refs (optional)
style.description: Cross-reference target reference(s), New Testament only

style.name: DEPRECATED xdc...xdc* - Cross Reference - DC Target Refs
style.description: Cross-reference target reference(s), Deuterocanon only

style.name: rq...rq* - Cross Reference - Inline Quotation References
style.description: Cross-reference indicating the source text for the preceding quotation.

style.name: qt...qt* - Special Text - Quoted Text - OT in NT
style.description: Old Testament quoted text appearing in the New Testament

style.name: nd...nd* - Special Text - Name of Deity
style.description: For name of deity (basic)

style.name: tl...tl* - Special Text - Transliterated Word
style.description: For transliterated words (basic)

style.name: dc...dc* - Special Text - Deuterocanonical/LXX Additions
style.description: Deuterocanonical/LXX additions or insertions in the Protocanonical text

style.name: bk...bk* - Special Text - Quoted book title
style.description: For the quoted name of a book

style.name: sig...sig* - Special Text - Author's Signature (Epistles)
style.description: For the signature of the author of an Epistle

style.name: pn...pn* - Special Text - Proper Name
style.description: For a proper name

style.name: png...png* - Special Text - Geographic Proper Name
style.description: For a geographic proper name

style.name: DEPRECATED addpn...addpn* - Special Text for Chinese
style.description: For chinese words to be dot underline & underline

style.name: wj...wj* - Special Text - Words of Jesus
style.description: For marking the words of Jesus

style.name: k...k* - Special Text - Keyword
style.description: For a keyword

style.name: sls...sls* - Special Text - Secondary Language or Text Source
style.description: To represent where the original text is in a secondary language or from an alternate text source

style.name: ord...ord* - Special Text - Ordinal number text portion
style.description: For the text portion of an ordinal number

style.name: add...add* - Special Text - Translational Addition
style.description: For a translational addition to the text (basic)

style.name: lit - Special Text - Liturgical note
style.description: For a comment or note inserted for liturgical use

style.name: no...no* - Character - Normal Text
style.description: A character style, use normal text

style.name: it...it* - Character - Italic Text
style.description: Italic character style one point smaller

style.name: bd...bd* - Character - Bold Text
style.description: A character style, use bold text

style.name: bdit...bdit* - Character - BoldItalic Text
style.description: A character style, use bold + italic text

style.name: em...em* - Character - Emphasized Text
style.description: A character style, use emphasized text style

style.name: sc...sc* - Character - Small Caps
style.description: For in-line inscriptions

style.name: sup...sup* - Character - Superscript
style.description: A character style, for superscript text. Typically for use in critical edition footnotes.

style.name: pb - Break - Page Break
style.description: Page Break used for new reader portions and children's bibles where content is controlled by the page

style.name: fig...fig* - Auxiliary - Figure/Illustration/Map
style.description: Illustration [Columns to span, height, filename, caption text]

style.name: jmp...jmp* - Link text
style.description: For associating linking attributes to a span of text

style.name: DEPRECATED pro...pro* - Special Text - CJK Pronunciation
style.description: For indicating pronunciation in CJK texts

style.name: rb...rb* - Special Text - Ruby Glossing
style.description: Most often used to provide a reading / pronunciation guide in ideographic scripts

style.name: w...w* - Peripheral Ref - Wordlist Entry
style.description: A wordlist text item

style.name: wh...wh* - Peripheral Ref - Hebrew Wordlist Entry
style.description: A Hebrew wordlist text item

style.name: wg...wg* - Peripheral Ref - Greek Wordlist Entry
style.description: A Greek Wordlist text item

style.name: wa...wa* - Peripheral Ref - Aramaic Wordlist Entry
style.description: An Aramaic Wordlist text item

style.name: ndx...ndx* - Peripheral Ref - Subject Index Entry
style.description: A subject index text item

style.name: periph - Peripherals - Content Division Marker
style.description: Peripheral content division marker which should be followed by an additional division argument/title.

style.name: p1 - Periph - Front/Back Matter Paragraph Level 1
style.description: Front or back matter text paragraph, level 1 (if multiple levels)

style.name: p2 - Periph - Front/Back Matter Paragraph Level 2
style.description: Front or back matter text paragraph, level 2 (if multiple levels)

style.name: k1 - Periph - Concordance Keyword Level 1
style.description: Concordance main entry text or keyword, level 1

style.name: k2 - Periph - Concordance Keyword Level 2
style.description: Concordance main entry text or keyword, level 2

style.name: xtSee - Concordance and Names Index - Alternate Entry Target Reference
style.description: Concordance and Names Index markup for an alternate entry target reference.

style.name: xtSeeAlso - Concordance and Names Index - Additional Entry Target Reference
style.description: Concordance and Names Index markup for an additional entry target reference.

style.name: Quotation start/end milestone
style.description: Quotation start/end milestone, level 1 (if single level)

style.name: Quotation start/end milestone - Level 1
style.description: Quotation start/end milestone, level 1 (if multiple levels)

style.description: Quotation start/end milestone, level 2

style.description: Quotation start/end milestone, level 5

style.description: Translator's section start/end milestone

style.name: DEPRECATED ph - Paragraph - Hanging Indent - Level 1
style.description: Paragraph text, with level 1 hanging indent (if single level)

style.name: DEPRECATED ph1 - Paragraph - Hanging Indent - Level 1
style.description: Paragraph text, with level 1 hanging indent (if multiple levels)

style.description: Paragraph text, with level 2 hanging indent

style.description: Paragraph text, with level 3 hanging indent

style.name: OBSOLETE tr1 - Table - Row - Level 1
style.description: A table Row

style.name: OBSOLETE tr2 - Table - Row - Level 2
style.description: A table Row

style.name: OBSOLETE ps - Paragraph - No Break with Next Paragraph
style.description: Paragraph text, no break with next paragraph text at chapter boundary

style.name: OBSOLETE psi - Paragraph - Indented - No Break with Next
style.description: Paragraph text, indented, with no break with next paragraph text (at chapter boundary)

style.name: DEPRECATED fs - Footnote - Footnote Summary
style.description: A summary text for the concept/idea/quotation from the scripture translation for which the note is being provided.

style.description: A Wordlist text item

style.description: Front matter publication data
